resources.string: This is an independent app used to provide information about Covid-19 cases globally and for each country. It is available in English and French languages. Dark mode viewing setting available. This app uses data available through Corona Covid-19 REST API from https://about-corona.net. It uses icons made by Freepik from https://www.flaticon.com. The play store listing contains feature graphic and hi resolution image by Miroslava Chrienova from Pixabay.

I, the developer, built the Covid-19 Status app as a free app. This app is provided by me at no cost and is intended for use as is. No personally identifiable information is collected. The app does not collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone called Log Data. The developer is not responsible for the accuracy of the data gathered from the rest api used. If you have any questions or suggestions about the Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact me srikanthganesanapps@gmail.com.
